name: Gravity Platformer Demo
description:
This is the prototype of a first-person parkour-platformer I've been working on for the past few weeks.
This demo is made to gather feedback on the game and it's concept, and gauge the interest for a game of this kind.

(Scroll down for patch notes)

Please take the time to complete the survey (link is in the game) once you're done with the demo!
Thanks in advance and have fun!

Want to stay up-to date on the game and/or see what I'm up to? Follow me on Twitter!
